title: Neufs mecs
overview: Victor, a musician, is planning a tour with his ex-girlfriend, with whom he is still very much in love; Simon has decided to introduce his fianc√©e to his mother who is absolutely convinced that he is gay; Martin, perfectly bilingual, pretends to need English lessons because he is in love with his teacher; Thomas, the osteopath on the ground floor is stuck on his divorce and is stuck on his back...
